{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:01:48.719
    | text      = So the reason that I reached out and the reason that I wanted to talk to you is actually I
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:01:55.040
    | text      = had read Black Skinhead quite some time ago, but I had followed up, I can't remember why,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:02:02.120
    | text      = but I had followed up on your coverage of COVID disinformation specifically in the black
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:02:09.039
    | text      = community.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:02:10.039
    | text      = I was hoping that you would be able to better describe the nodes wherein that is best expressed,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:02:17.680
    | text      = if that makes sense.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:02:20.680
    | text      = So what do you think is the first major starting point for disinformation?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:02:30.599
    | text      = So a couple of things, I think there's the different categories.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:02:34.639
    | text      = So misinformation, unintentionally shared, inaccurate, or out of context information,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:02:42.199
    | text      = and then there's disinformation, which is intentional creation of campaigns to forward
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:02:48.280
    | text      = a certain narrative.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:02:50.759
    | text      = And so I think one of the big pieces of this is that I think most people, black and any
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:02:58.319
    | text      = other community, share misinformation at some point.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:01.960
    | text      = I know I've definitely shared misinformation.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:05.520
    | text      = It's really easy to in the kind of information economy we live in, but this idea of disinformation
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:11.379
    | text      = and how intentional hostile narratives are planted for often like political brand damage
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:20.659
    | text      = or sort of financial ends is something that we see a lot of across different communities.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:27.479
    | text      = I think one of the things that I've been thinking about lately is that because of the way that
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:33.199
    | text      = internet research studies, which is a lot of what I do, is often disconnected from community
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:40.560
    | text      = based research and organizing, we actually don't have a lot of data on how disinformation
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:47.520
    | text      = may drive political activity per se.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:51.439
    | text      = And so we've got like a lot of correlations and not necessarily causation, but one of
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:57.360
    | text      = the things with the canary in the coal mine report, which was looking at the early days
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:04.599
    | text      = of missing and disinformation around COVID, I at that time was working at Color of Change,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:11.919
    | text      = which is a racial justice advocacy organization.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:14.419
    | text      = And we had been in a lot of conversations with tech companies around disinformation
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:19.000
    | text      = online.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:20.259
    | text      = And I started to notice that there were these narratives popping up that black people couldn't
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:26.839
    | text      = get COVID.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:28.720
    | text      = And the initial different categories that we saw were, one example was that COVID comes
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:38.519
    | text      = from 5G.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:39.519
    | text      = And because black people don't have a lot of 5G in our communities, we weren't susceptible
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:45.199
    | text      = that, melanin kept black people protected, all sorts of stuff around Bill Gates conspiracism.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:55.639
    | text      = And so we actually documented some of this at Color of Change and sent it to Twitter.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:01.240
    | text      = And this was like February of 2020 about, and they didn't take any action to deal with
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:08.199
    | text      = anything online.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:09.319
    | text      = They said that they didn't see it was a problem.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:11.040
    | text      = Well, that's gotten better now.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:12.959
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:13.959
    | text      = Shocking, right?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:14.959
    | text      = Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:15.959
    | text      = And I think to me, like, so I started this report because one, I wanted to document this
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:20.060
    | text      = because we knew that that was not true.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:22.680
    | text      = And that was a really dangerous narrative that was putting people in danger and that
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:26.759
    | text      = black people have certain amount of disproportionate pre-existing conditions that actually make
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:31.519
    | text      = us more susceptible.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:33.360
    | text      = And one of the layers that I uncovered around that was a story around media failures, essentially,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:41.639
    | text      = and that the gap in story is what allows conspiracism to fill it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:46.199
    | text      = And so in the early days of reporting of COVID, there wasn't many articles that were talking
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:53.439
    | text      = about the race of people or even placing them in neighborhoods.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:57.240
    | text      = And so what we found out later is that actually a lot of the early deaths in the US were black
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:02.399
    | text      = people, but it wasn't, those numbers weren't being like reported.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:06.399
    | text      = And because of the lack of black owned and controlled media within communities, a newspaper
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:11.220
    | text      = like maybe Chicago Defender back in the day that would have been doing that work, they're
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:15.240
    | text      = not able to do that same work anymore.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:17.759
    | text      = So people were going online for information and it was spreading really rapidly and you
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:22.720
    | text      = had like really public figures that were putting out, you know, in some cases misinformation
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:28.740
    | text      = and in some cases with folks like Candace Owens, what I believe was intentional disinformation.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:34.079
    | text      = And so that's how we wanted to kind of like talk about that space.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:37.819
    | text      = And so for me, when I think about what happens with black communities is that oftentimes
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:46.319
    | text      = our stories are not told holistically and certain like mainstream media outlets, we're
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:51.759
    | text      = losing local owned and controlled newspapers, which is happening across the board across
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:55.800
    | text      = different groups, right?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:57.879
    | text      = And because that gap is there, people are choosing different like broadcasters and spaces
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:05.480
    | text      = to go to collect information.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:08.720
    | text      = And that's where you see a lot of disinformation spread.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:10.800
    | text      = And so now it's part of what we saw was like a flip from black people can't get COVID to,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:27.120
    | text      = Or you see, you know, kind of in political discourse, a lot of stuff around like, you know, how black
}}

{{TranscriptBlock

    | text      = genocide is happening in all these different ways through different political figures.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:39.379

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:14.439

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:18.759

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

}}
